collectionMetadata.name: Percentage of O-Level Cohort that Progressed to Post-Secondary Education
collectionMetadata.description:
Notes:

1) Figures for 2017 - 2021 are preliminary as students from the same cohort could be admitted to post-secondary education institutions later. Data for 2021 may be under-estimates as the admission data for 2022 into private education institutions is not available yet. 

2) Figures include participation in Junior Colleges, Millennia Institute, Polytechnics, Institute of Technical Education (ITE), LASALLE College of the Arts, Nanyang Academy of Fine Arts and other private education institutions, and take into account of students who have left the country. From 2015 onwards, figures also include participation in Privately-Funded Schools and Foreign System Schools.

datasetMetadata.name: Percentage of O-Level Students who Progressed to Post-Secondary Education
datasetMetadata.description:
(1) Figures include participation in Junior Colleges, Millennia Institute, Polytechnics, Institute of Technical Education (ITE), LASALLE College of the Arts, Nanyang Academy of Fine Arts and other private education institutions, and take into account of students who have left the country. From 2015 onwards, figures also include participation in Privately-Funded Schools and Foreign System Schools. 

(2) Figures for the last 5 years are preliminary estimates as these cohorts have not been fully tracked.
